            qesmw=n tw=n i(drume/nwn kai\ ou(\s a)\n to\ loipo\n i(dru/swntai e)mfro/nws: e)a\n de/
            tis a)nairei=, ou)k e)pitre/yw kata/ te e)mauto\n kai\ meta\ pa/ntwn, kai\ timh/sw
            i(era\ ta\ pa/tria. i)/stores qeoi\ *)/agraulos, *(esti/a, *)enuw/, *)enua/lios, *)/arhs
            kai\ *)aqhna= *)arei/a, *zeu/s, *qallw/, *au)cw/, *(hgemo/nh, *(hraklh=s, o(/roi th=s

          th=| po/lei. tri/a ga/r e)sti ta\ me/gista a(\ diafula/ttei kai\ diasw/|zei th\n
          dhmokrati/an kai\ th\n th=s po/lews eu)daimoni/an, 
          prw=ton me\n h( tw=n no/mwn ta/cis, deu/teron d' h( tw=n dikastw=n yh=fos, tri/ton d' h(
          tou/tois ta)dikh/mata paradidou=sa kri/sis. o( me\n ga\r no/mos pe/fuke prole/gein a(\ mh\ dei=
          pra/ttein, o( de\ kath/goros mhnu/ein tou\s e)no/xous toi=s e)k tw=n no/mwn e)pitimi/ois
          kaqestw=tas, o( de\ dikasth\s kola/zein tou\s u(p' a)mfote/rwn tou/twn a)podeixqe/ntas au)tw=|, w(/st' ou)/q' o(
          no/mos ou)/q' h( tw=n dikastw=n yh=fos a)/neu tou= paradw/sontos au)toi=s tou\s
          a)dikou=ntas i)sxu/ei.  e)gw\ d', w)= *)aqhnai=oi,

          pa/ntwn u(mw=n gegenhme/non.  poli/tou ga/r e)sti
          dikai/ou mh\ dia\ ta\s i)di/as e)/xqras ei)s ta\s koina\s kri/seis kaqista/nai tou\s
